The ooze attack deals [[/roll 2D4x4]]{2D4!} @UUID[Compendium.neon-lords.journal.JournalEntry.GolSNvsGoLOK5zXR.JournalEntryPage.LhAmzh45MygNzafA]{Vile} damage with @UUID[Compendium.neon-lords.journal.JournalEntry.GolSNvsGoLOK5zXR.JournalEntryPage.9skDCk49uq5QjTMT]{Spillover}. Mega Meltdown: The Noise Thrasher can spend additional Shred Points to hit more targets beyond the first.
